personal.name: Aliakbar
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.description: Passionate about creating innovative solutions and building amazing user experiences.

about.description1: I'm a passionate software engineer with a love for creating innovative solutions and building amazing user experiences. With expertise in modern web technologies, I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive solutions.
about.description2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with React frontend and Node.js backend, featuring user authentication, payment integration, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project tracking capabilities.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard with data visualization, real-time metrics, and customizable reports for business intelligence.

contact.title: Let's work together!
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Feel free to reach out!
